name: Eventin Divi Addon
author: Themewinter

sections.description:
DIVI, the most popular WYSIWYG builder is now supported on Eventin. Design with Divi to create the perfect Event Management and Ticket Selling Website. Enjoy Eventin features and functionality with DIVI modules. Design with Divi to create the perfect event management website.

Support ðŸ‘‡

ðŸ‘‰ For support and issues? Contact Us Here
ðŸ‘‰ Want to know more about Eventin? Eventin Free | Eventin Pro

ðŸ‘‰ Documentation

Notable Features You can get in Divi addons

Event List â€“ Show multiple events on your page with an event listing feature. You can list related events to let users choose from similar events they want to attend.

Events Tab â€“ Create event tabs with an event tab widget.
Schedule List â€“ Insert schedule lists to show the event agenda.
Schedule Tab â€“ Insert event schedules in tabs format.
Speaker List â€“ Show your event speakers to your guests by creating a speaker listing on your event page.
Advanced Search â€“ Filter events on the archive page with advanced search.
Event Calendar â€“ Calendar brings a better user experience by providing straight designs. Users will be able to see all the available live events and select the specific date to see which events are under that event.

Eventin Parent Plugin Key Feature:

  • Unlimited Single/Multiple Events
  • Simplified Schedule Management
  • Maintain Recurring Events
  • Multi-vendor Event Marketplace (Beta)
  • Unique QR Code for Attendees
  • Showcase Speakers/Organizers
  • Multi-tier Ticket Pricing
  • Unique Attendee Management
  • Event Calendar View
  • Detailed Analytics Report
  • Custom Field for Attendee Form
  • WooCommerce Payment System
  • Grounghogg & FluentCRM Integration
  • Event Venue with Google Maps
  • Purchased Event Details on Userâ€™s Dashboard
  • WooCommerce Coupon for Events
  • Stripe Payment System
  • Multivendor Event Marketplace

For more features, check Eventin landing page.

Other Plugins by the Same Team

  • WPCafe – WordPress Event Plugin for Events Manager, Event Calendar, WooCommerce Event Tickets.
  • WPCafe Multivendor Addon – WordPress Event Plugin for Events Manager, Event Calendar, WooCommerce Event Tickets.
  • WPCafe Oxygen Addons – Restaurant Addon for Oxygen Builder
sections.faq:
Should I install Eventin Plugin for the addons?

YES! The addons work with Eventin. To get full functionality, you will need to install the Eventin plugin.
sections.changelog:
1.0.6 (27 June 2024)

  • Fix : Recurring event issue
  • Tweak : Remove zoom meetings support

1.0.5 (06 May 2024)

  • Tweak : Plugin dependency updated

1.0.4 (25 September 2023)

  • Fix : Event Calendar Pro List Module issue Fixed
  • Check : WordPress 6.3 Compatibility issue Check

1.0.3 (15 June 2023)

  • Fix : Amelia Conflict Issue Fixed

1.0.2 (10 January 2023)

  • New : Oneline Events Module Added
  • New : Zoom Module Added
  • Fix : Editor Console Issue Fixed

1.0.1 (2 September 2022)

  • Added: Event Classic Pro Module
  • Fixed: Description limit in all modules
  • Fixed: Show thumbnail yes/no for all modules
  • Fixed: Auto play options for speaker slider
  • Fixed: Same style issues for speaker slider module
  • Fixed: Show descriptions options in all modules
  • Fixed: Event Pro styles issue
  • Fixed: Slider control dynamic options in speaker slider
  • Fixed: Schedule list issue in Schedule module

1.0.0 (14 August 2022)

  • initial release
